text:
Bethany:
Now that we’ve finished our homework, let’s take the pets to the park.

Babels:
Did you hear that?
We’re going out!

Bozzie:
Hey, where is Barkie?

Ben :
Where is Barkie? I can’t see him around.

Becca:
Must be in the pillow room after having his fill of treats.

Blake:
I’ll go get him.

Blake:
Barkie.
Barkie. Come here boy. We’re going to the park.

Blake:
That’s strange. Where could he be?
Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom!
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad ! Be strong,
Be brave,
Be smart,
Be kind
Solving problems we don’t mind!
We are the closest friends you’ll ever find.
Bottle Squad
Ba Ba Bottle Squad

Blake:
I have looked everywhere.
He is nowhere to be seen.
We need to split up and find him.

Bethany:
Do you know where Barkie can be?

Bethany:
Barkie… mall day… he’s in the mall?
Let’s split up and check the mall.
But, before that, let’s power up.

Ben:
You guys stay here, ok? We will be back soon.
“BA BA BOOM! WE’RE READY TO ZOOM!”

Beans:
Oh Oh !I wish the babies could follow what we say.
Barkie was talking something important he had to do, all day.

Babbles:
And he was being secretive about it!
I wonder why?

Bethany:
Where could Barkie be?
Which is his favourite shop in the mall?
Bingo!

Ben:
There he is. Barkie!
Oh, sorry. I thought you were my friend.
But have you seen Barkie anywhere?

Bethany:
There was a dog that came in, but with another little girl.
From the description I was given, it sounds like Barkie!
He was given lots of candy treats and he left with the little girl.

Ben:
Oh no! Did Barkie leave us?

Becca:
Or maybe he was kidnapped.

Blake:
Whatever it is, we must find them.
He’s our pet. Let’s go.

Blake:
Becca and Bethany, you head that way.
Ben and I will head this way. We will find him today.

Becca:
What’s the…

Blake:
Where were you, little fella?
You scared us. We thought you went away.

Bethany:
So, you were protecting your candy from everybody else, weren’t you?

We power up and don’t give up
That’s our Ba-Ba Promise to you!
